title: New clothing policy: what you need to know

data.leadParagraph: There's been an update to our clothing policy

data.paragraph: Your visitors can bring 1 parcel of new clothes clothes for you each year. So, once you’ve had a parcel like this you’ll have to wait 12 months to be allowed to get another.
Residents who have been on enhanced R&R for the last 6 months continuously.

orderedList: Put in application (app) for a parcel.
When that’s approved, your visitors hand in the parcel at the start of a visit.
When it’s been checked, it’ll be added to your property card.

data.paragraphNoMargin: This is not an addition to the amount of possessions you are allowed under the ‘volumetric control’ rules:

unorderedList: 1 ‘outsized’ item (for example, a stereo or guitar).

data.insertText: If your new clothes take you over your allowance, you’ll have to make some decisions and send what is left into storage.
